Public Delegate Sub RepeaterItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As RepeaterItemEventArgs)
public delegate void RepeaterItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, RepeaterItemEventArgs ^ e);
type RepeaterItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * RepeaterItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 的 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件的。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event of the . 显示新的一行文本的项类型，该值指示每当创建项。A new line of text indicating the item type is displayed whenever a item is created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RepeaterItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItemEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RepeaterItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItemEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
